build.beforeDevCommand: sh -c 'if [ -x ./scripts/dev-frontend.sh ]; then ./scripts/dev-frontend.sh; elif [ -x ../scripts/dev-frontend.sh ]; then ../scripts/dev-frontend.sh; elif [ -x ../../scripts/dev-frontend.sh ]; then ../../scripts/dev-frontend.sh; else echo "dev-frontend.sh not found" >&2; exit 127; fi'
build.beforeBuildCommand: sh -c 'if [ -x ./scripts/build-frontend.sh ]; then ./scripts/build-frontend.sh; elif [ -x ../scripts/build-frontend.sh ]; then ../scripts/build-frontend.sh; elif [ -x ../../scripts/build-frontend.sh ]; then ../../scripts/build-frontend.sh; else echo "build-frontend.sh not found" >&2; exit 127; fi'
